snippet: A fuel truck exploded in South Sudan, killing dozens of people who had converged around the vehicle to siphon fuel, officials said Thursday.
abstract: At least 85 people die while siphoning fuel from wrecked tanker truck in South Sudan after lit cigarette causes it to explode.
lead_paragraph: A fuel truck exploded in South Sudan, killing dozens of people who had converged around the vehicle to siphon fuel, officials said Thursday.

headline.main: Dozens Killed in South Sudan Fuel Tanker Explosion
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; South Sudan: Scores Are Killed as Fuel Truck Explodes
